attributes.action: STOP PRELOVED AND GUMTREE WEBSITES ADVERTISING FREE TO GOOD HOME ANIMALS
attributes.additional_details:
Websites such as Gumtree and Preloved are still allowing people to advertise FREE animals to anyone , these websites are being used by dog fighters for dog bait who pre tray themselves as responsible dog and cat owners. Only then use the animal as dog bait in dog fighting.
Please sign and lets get some responsibility from these websites.
